import React from 'react' import { ArrowDownIcon, ArrowUpIcon, CheckCircleIcon, XCircleIcon, ClockIcon } from 'lucide-react' const StatusCard = ({ title, description, count, icon, color }) => (

{title}

{icon}

{description}

{count}
) export default function MessageDashboard() { const incomingStatuses = [ { title: 'Pending', description: 'Messages being processed', count: 15, icon: , color: 'hover:bg-yellow-50' }, { title: 'Error', description: 'Messages with validation errors', count: 3, icon: , color: 'hover:bg-red-50' }, { title: 'Processed', description: 'Successfully validated messages', count: 42, icon: , color: 'hover:bg-green-50' }, ] const outgoingStatuses = [ { title: 'Transformed', description: 'Messages converted to destination format', count: 38, icon: , color: 'hover:bg-blue-50' }, { title: 'Error', description: 'Messages failed during transformation', count: 2, icon: , color: 'hover:bg-red-50' }, { title: 'Delivered', description: 'Messages successfully delivered', count: 36, icon: , color: 'hover:bg-green-50' }, ] return (

Message Processing Dashboard

Incoming Messages

{incomingStatuses.map((status, index) => ( ))}

Outgoing Messages

{outgoingStatuses.map((status, index) => ( ))}
) }
